get_loan_amount: To start, how much did you borrow? (0 to 1,000,000,000)
get_annual_percent: What's your annual percentage rate (APR)? (0 to 100, 5.7% would be 5.7)
get_loan_duration: How many months is your loan duration, in numbers? (1 to 1200)
invalid_number: That's not a useable number... please try again.
invalid_duration: Loan duration needs to be a whole number betwewen 1 and 1200
invalid_continue: Please answer with one of the following:
